name: EAT BEAT DEADSPIKE-san
description:
"EAT BEAT DEADSPIKE-san" is a rhythm action game spin-off of the 2D-fighting game series, "BLAZBLUE", that features Dead Spike-san in a eating frenzy.

How to Play
The controls are simple, tap the buttons to the beat and eat the incoming food! Enjoy the music of "BLAZBLUE" while having Dead Spike-san eat as much food as possible!

Featuring a total of 20 playable songs!
There are 3 difficulties: "Easy", "Normal", or "Hard" for each of the song. Anyone can enjoy playing by choosing the appropriate difficulty.

AWARD system for replayability!
A total of 14 objectives to clear for a full complete!

Simple and interesting!
Groove to the rhythm and aim to achieve high calories(score)!
